titleStmt.title: Collections, or brief notes gathered out of Mr Daniel Rogers's practical catechism for private use : and how hereby communicated to som private friends, towards the building of them up in their holie faith. / By R.P.
titleStmt.author: D. R. (Daniel Rogers), 1573-1652.
R. P.

publicationStmt.date: Printed for the author. Anno Domini 1648.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
